mapper.sql: a.ID, a.USERID, a.USERNAME, a.MGID, a.MGTYPE, a.MGSTATE, a.MGCONTENT, a.USERMGSTATE, a.CREATE_TIME, a.CREATE_USER, a.UPDATE_TIME, a.UPDATE_USER
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ( select ur.ID, ur.USERID, ur.USERNAME, ur.MGID, mc.MGTYPE, mc.MGSTATE, mc.MGCONTENT, ur.USERMGSTATE, ur.CREATE_TIME, ur.CREATE_USER, ur.UPDATE_TIME, ur.UPDATE_USER from usermessagerela ur join messagecenter mc on mc.id=ur.mgid ) a
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') as uuid
insert into usermessagerela
ID,
USERID,
USERNAME,
MGID,
USERMGSTATE,
CREATE_TIME,
CREATE_USER,
UPDATE_TIME,
UPDATE_USER,

mapper.update:
update usermessagerela
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERID = #{record.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERNAME = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MGID = #{record.mgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERMGSTATE = #{record.usermgstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update usermessagerela set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERID = #{record.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MGID = #{record.mgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERMGSTATE = #{record.usermgstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update usermessagerela
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MGID = #{mgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERMGSTATE = #{usermgstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
